result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason R Roth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd-Degree Recklessly Endangering Safety [Modifiers: Repeater], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.30(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.

Must complete an AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes:
5 months to begin serving immediately.  May serve in another county if at no cost to Polk County.  
7 months banked/stayed for use by Probation if necessary.

9:23 Defendant Jason R Roth in court with attorney Kate Mary Murtaugh.  Defendant Jason R Roth in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JP-clerk  DA Argument.  Atty Murtaugh Argument.  JRoth addresses ct.  Break until 10:05.  10:10 back on record.  

SENTENCING:  5 years with 3 years ES, I&S.   Probation 4 years. No drink probation.  Follow conditions of probation. AODA & comply.  Fine of $250.00 for DNA sample.  Fine/Costs $290.60 to be paid thru probation.  No Illegal susbtance.  1 year conditional time, ct will bank 7 months of conditional time with 5 months conditional time remaining.  Subj to work/homemaker release.  May serve in another county if at no cost to Polk County.  Not subj to good time.  Sentence Credit - 29 days.  If that is not correct, Atty Murtaugh to notify court.  No expungement.  Convicted felon.   Ct goes over PC Rights.  10:43 adj.
